verses.verse: וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> Now after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּמַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> in the reign אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרָ֑ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia עֶזְרָא֙ <S%H5830><s%> Ezra בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׂרָיָ֔ה <S%H8304><s%> of Seraiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> of Azariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִלְקִיָּֽה׃ <S%H2518><s%> of Hilkiah
בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son שַׁלּ֥וּם <S%H7967><s%> of Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <S%H285><s%> of Ahitub
בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <S%H568><s%> of Amariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <S%H5838><s%> of Azariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְרָיֽוֹת׃ <S%H4812><s%> of Meraioth
בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son זְרַֽחְיָ֥ה <S%H2228><s%> of Zerahiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֻזִּ֖י <S%H5813><s%> of Uzzi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֻּקִּֽי׃ <S%H1231><s%> of Bukki

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> The son אֲבִישׁ֗וּעַ <S%H50><s%> of Abishua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פִּֽינְחָס֙ <S%H6372><s%> of Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the chief

ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> This עֶזְרָא֙ <S%H5830><s%> This Ezra עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> went up מִבָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> This סֹפֵ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> scribe מָהִיר֙ <S%H4106><s%> and he [was] a ready בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> had given יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> granted ל֣וֹ הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king כְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> according to the hand יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֙ <S%H430><s%> his God עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all בַּקָּשָׁתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1246><s%> him all his request פ

וַיַּֽעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> And there went up מִבְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> [some] of the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Some הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <S%H3548><s%> and of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֧ים <S%H7891><s%> and the singers וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֛ים <S%H7778><s%> and the porters וְהַנְּתִינִ֖ים <S%H5411><s%> and the Nethinims אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> year שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> in the seventh לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he came יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֑י <S%H2549><s%> in the fifth הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> which שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖ית <S%H7637><s%> which [was] in the seventh לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> on בְּאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> For upon the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> [day] of the first ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְסֻ֔ד <S%H3246><s%> began הַֽמַּעֲלָ֖ה <S%H4609><s%> he to go up מִבָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon וּבְאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> and on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֗י <S%H2549><s%> [day] of the fifth בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> he to Jerusalem כְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אֱלֹהָ֖יו <S%H430><s%> of his God הַטּוֹבָ֥ה <S%H2896><s%> according to the good עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For עֶזְרָא֙ <S%H5830><s%> For Ezra הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> had prepared לְבָב֔וֹ <S%H3824><s%> his heart לִדְר֛וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלַעֲשֹׂ֑ת <S%H6213><s%> and to do וּלְלַמֵּ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> [it] and to teach בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel חֹ֥ק <S%H2706><s%> statutes וּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> and judgments ס

וְזֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> now this פַּרְשֶׁ֣גֶן <S%H6572><s%> Now this [is] the copy הַֽנִּשְׁתְּוָ֗ן <S%H5406><s%> of the letter אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַן֙ <S%H5414><s%> gave הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֔סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> Artaxerxes לְעֶזְרָ֥א <S%H5830><s%> unto Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe סֹפֵ֞ר <S%H5608><s%> [even] a scribe דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> of the words מִצְוֹת־ <S%H4687><s%> of the commandments יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְחֻקָּ֖יו <S%H2706><s%> and of his statutes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> to Israel פ

אַ֨רְתַּחְשַׁ֔סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> Artaxerxes מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> king מַלְכַיָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> of kings לְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5831><s%> unto Ezra כָ֠הֲנָא <S%H3549><s%> the priest סָפַ֨ר <S%H5613><s%> a scribe דָּתָ֜א <S%H1882><s%> of the law דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch אֱלָ֧הּ <S%H426><s%> of the God שְׁמַיָּ֛א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven גְּמִ֖יר <S%H1585><s%> perfect וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <S%H3706><s%> [peace] and at such a time

מִנִּי֮ <S%H4481><s%> I שִׂ֣ים <S%H7761><s%> make טְעֵם֒ <S%H2942><s%> a decree דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> that all מִתְנַדַּ֣ב <S%H5069><s%> which are minded of their own freewill בְּמַלְכוּתִי֩ <S%H4437><s%> in my realm מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> they of עַמָּ֨ה <S%H5972><s%> the people יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3479><s%> of Israel וְכָהֲנ֣וֹהִי <S%H3549><s%> and [of] his priests וְלֵוָיֵ֗א <S%H3879><s%> and Levites לִמְהָ֧ךְ <S%H1946><s%> to go up לִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֛ם <S%H3390><s%> to Jerusalem עִמָּ֖ךְ <S%H5974><s%> with thee יְהָֽךְ׃ <S%H1946><s%> go

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> as קֳבֵ֗ל <S%H6903><s%> according to דִּי֩ <S%H1768><s%> which מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> according קֳדָ֨ם <S%H6925><s%> by מַלְכָּ֜א <S%H4430><s%> the king וְשִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7655><s%> and of his seven יָעֲטֹ֙הִי֙ <S%H3272><s%> counsellors שְׁלִ֔יחַ <S%H7972><s%> thou art sent לְבַקָּרָ֥א <S%H1240><s%> to enquire עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> concerning יְה֖וּד <S%H3061><s%> Judah וְלִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> and Jerusalem בְּדָ֥ת <S%H1882><s%> according to the law אֱלָהָ֖ךְ <S%H426><s%> of thy God דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which בִידָֽךְ׃ <S%H3028><s%> which [is] in thine hand

וּלְהֵיבָלָ֖ה <S%H2987><s%> And to carry כְּסַ֣ף <S%H3702><s%> the silver וּדְהַ֑ב <S%H1722><s%> and gold דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whose מַלְכָּ֣א <S%H4430><s%> which the king וְיָעֲט֗וֹהִי <S%H3272><s%> and his counsellors הִתְנַדַּ֙בוּ֙ <S%H5069><s%> have freely offered לֶאֱלָ֣הּ <S%H426><s%> unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3479><s%> of Israel דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> whose בִֽירוּשְׁלֶ֖ם <S%H3390><s%> [is] in Jerusalem מִשְׁכְּנֵֽהּ׃ <S%H4907><s%> habitation

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3606><s%> And all כְּסַ֣ף <S%H3702><s%> the silver וּדְהַ֔ב <S%H1722><s%> and gold דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which תְהַשְׁכַּ֔ח <S%H7912><s%> that thou canst find בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> in all מְדִינַ֣ת <S%H4083><s%> the province בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H895><s%> of Babylon עִם֩ <S%H5974><s%> with הִתְנַדָּב֨וּת <S%H5069><s%> the freewill offering עַמָּ֤א <S%H5972><s%> of the people וְכָֽהֲנַיָּא֙ <S%H3549><s%> and of the priests מִֽתְנַדְּבִ֔ין <S%H5069><s%> offering willingly לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> for the house אֱלָהֲהֹ֖ם <S%H426><s%> of their God דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which בִירוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <S%H3390><s%> which [is] in Jerusalem

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵ֣ל <S%H6903><s%> with דְּנָה֩ <S%H1836><s%> with this אָסְפַּ֨רְנָא <S%H629><s%> speedily תִקְנֵ֜א <S%H7066><s%> thou mayest buy בְּכַסְפָּ֣א <S%H3702><s%> money דְנָ֗ה <S%H1836><s%> this תּוֹרִ֤ין ׀ <S%H8450><s%> bullocks דִּכְרִין֙ <S%H1798><s%> rams אִמְּרִ֔ין <S%H563><s%> lambs וּמִנְחָתְה֖וֹן <S%H4504><s%> with their meat offerings וְנִסְכֵּיה֑וֹן <S%H5261><s%> and their drink offerings וּתְקָרֵ֣ב <S%H7127><s%> and offer הִמּ֔וֹ <S%H1994><s%> them עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon מַדְבְּחָ֔ה <S%H4056><s%> the altar דִּ֛י <S%H1768><s%> which בֵּ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> of the house אֱלָהֲכֹ֖ם <S%H426><s%> of your God דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which בִירוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <S%H3390><s%> which [is] in Jerusalem

וּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> Whatever דִי֩ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֨ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) וְעַל־ <S%H5922><s%> to thee and to [אֶחַיִךְ כ] (אֶחָ֜ךְ <S%H252><s%> brother ק) יִיטַ֗ב <S%H3191><s%> shall seem good בִּשְׁאָ֛ר <S%H7606><s%> with the rest כַּסְפָּ֥א <S%H3702><s%> of the silver וְדַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H1722><s%> and the gold לְמֶעְבַּ֑ד <S%H5648><s%> to do כִּרְע֥וּת <S%H7470><s%> after the will אֱלָהֲכֹ֖ם <S%H426><s%> of your God תַּעַבְדֽוּן׃ <S%H5648><s%> that do

וּמָֽאנַיָּא֙ <S%H3984><s%> The vessels דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which מִתְיַהֲבִ֣ין <S%H3052><s%> also that are given לָ֔ךְ לְפָלְחָ֖ן <S%H6402><s%> thee for the service בֵּ֣ית <S%H1005><s%> of the house אֱלָהָ֑ךְ <S%H426><s%> of thy God הַשְׁלֵ֕ם <S%H8000><s%> [those] deliver קֳדָ֖ם <S%H6925><s%> thou before אֱלָ֥הּ <S%H426><s%> the God יְרוּשְׁלֶֽם׃ <S%H3390><s%> of Jerusalem
